title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Digital Game-Based English Science Literacy Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension and understanding of core science curriculum concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Improving academic English reading comprehension skills in over 80% of learners using digital game-based science content
Acquiring effective communication skills in peer assessment and feedback processes by 90% of learners through game-based collaborative activities
Achieving the ability to summarize English research papers by 70% of learners based on science simulation game analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
